description: Dana is the mechanic of Team Red Meteor and he performs machine maintenance and changes tires during races. He competed in the 25th Kokeko Cup where they where the team was the self-imposed favorites to win the race but Hayate`s pushy nature ended up being too much for their Dendimushi car which got stuck on ice going up a hill in the 3rd and final stage, resulting in them loosing the race to Sophocles`s Charjabug car.
name: Dana
